author: Kathryn Hertel
text:
I am looking for council approved user fee policies from communities with populations greater than 100,000.  I'm hoping to find policies that utilize "best practices", clearly explain when, why and how certain fees increase and provide a timeline for reviewing and increasing/decreasing fees.  Does anyone have such a policy?  If so, could you please attach it to this question?
Thank you!
Kathryn Hertel
City of Raleigh
title: User Fee Policy
